description: Returns the list of supported stage types of a PDAL Pipeline.
Read and import a variety of point cloud data file formats using the PDAL library.
Read the metadata from point cloud file[s].
Read and import a point cloud data file, applying also a custom processing pipeline to the data.
Apply a custom processing pipeline to the input table.
example: SELECT * FROM PDAL_PipelineTable((SELECT X,Y,Z FROM ...), '[ {type: filters.tail, count: 100} ]');

description: Write collection of data points to a point cloud data file.
example: COPY ( ... ) TO './test/data/autzen_new.laz' WITH (FORMAT PDAL, DRIVER 'LAS', CREATION_OPTIONS ('COMPRESSION=true', ...));
